My apologies then, I was in the wrong.

::Killfest/Prowl/Grimmler::

Killfest jumps to the left, several chain gun shots hitting his right
side, but his armor was too heavy to be pierced by them. He fires four
more EMP blasts, aiming them all at Hell Beast. He was glad that he
took out Inferno, and from the power of his EMP gun, probably for the
entire fight, but he wanted to kill Hell Beast as well.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl avoids the missiles, feeling shots riddle his armor. He roars
and keeps flying up, swiping his large claws at Cracken.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler dives in the air, an optic blast hitting him in the shoulder.
He growls and fires two more missiles at Adrax. He smiles as he sees
the Element (Jen, can you put G or S in parenthesis next time, to
distinguish between Element the gestalt, and Element then ship?) open
fire on the attackers.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
> It wasnt a mode Yan, I said he missles exploded on the right and
left side of 
> Iron Raptor, not on her body at all.
> 
>        Marine's eyes bulged with the optic blast ready to strike at
Iron 
> Raptor, and they did. The sets of blasts cut thin green lines
through the 
> smoke at the beast. 
>        Acid splattered Marine, and small holes began to bubble on
his armor 
> as the acrid smell and steam rose. Grabbing onto his plasma assult
riffle 
> with both hands, he aimed, and released a spitfire of plasma, 25
shots, at IR.
> 
>        Craken was in his assault chapper , and picked up Prowl even
before he 
> left the ground. Craken, large and armed with a dual chain gun and
missle 
> launchers, sent four missles scattering at Prowl as his chain gun
lit up 
> sending 25 shots each.
> 
>        Adrax is sent to the ground as one missles explodes on his
back, 
> opening a nasty slit. He turns over and counter attacks with 15
blasts from 
> two angry optics.
> 
>        Hell Beast see's the discharge by Killfest on a small wrist
radar, 
> turns, and slams Inferno into them. With a bright blaze Infern ofel
to the 
> ground with his head comically spinning on his neck. Hel lBeast
goffed, and 
> fired his chain gun at Killfest.
>        Meanwhile, The blasts fired by Element, not to sure which
one, burst 
> around them. The Four Predacons began to run, taking numerous hits.
